snippet: The Harris County sheriff said eight of his employees had been fired, quit or retired after an investigation of sexual misconduct at county jails.
lead_paragraph: The Harris County sheriff said eight of his employees had been fired, quit or retired after an investigation of sexual misconduct at county jails.

headline.main: Texas: Sheriff’s Workers Accused of Sex With Inmates
headline.print_headline: Texas: Sheriff’s Workers Accused of Sex With Inmates
